languages.text:
The Soldier gains the ability to make a number of extra attacks equal to their weapon's {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g} (minimum 2), using the weapon attack that normally costs the least {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. These attacks do not spend AP.
-<indent=5%>Until the end of the Soldier's turn, their first attack against each new enemy automatically scores a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>The Soldier immediately reloads their current weapon.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Starting from the next round and until the end of combat, the Soldier's AP are reduced by −1.</indent>
languages.original_text:
Солдат получает способность без затрат ОД совершать дополнительные атаки — те, что при использовании выбранного оружия в обычном случае требуют меньше всего {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g}. Количество этих атак равно {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}скорострельности{/g} оружия (минимум 2).
-<indent=5%>До конца хода солдата каждое первое его попадание в новую цель становится {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}критическим{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Солдат немедленно перезаряжает используемое оружие.</indent>
-<indent=5%>С начала следующего раунда до конца боя у солдата становится на 1 ОД меньше.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
- The Marksman gains the ability to make a number of extra attacks equal to their weapon's rate of fire (minimum 2) using their weapon's attack that normally costs the least AP. These attacks do not spend AP.
- Until the end of the Marksman's turn, their first attack against each new enemy automatically scores a critical hit.
- The Marksman immediately reloads their current weapon.
- Starting from the next round and until the end of combat, the Marksman's AP are reduced by -1.

The Marksman gains the ability to make a number of extra attacks equal to their weapon's rate of fire (minimum 2) using their weapon's attack that normally costs the least AP. These attacks do not spend AP.
-<indent=5%>Until the end of the Marksman's turn, their first attack against each new enemy automatically scores a critical hit.</indent>
-<indent=5%>The Marksman immediately reloads their current weapon.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Starting from the next round and until the end of combat, the Marksman's AP are reduced by −1.</indent>

The Soldier gains the ability to make a number of extra attacks equal to their weapon's {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g} (minimum 2), using the weapon attack that normally costs the least {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. These attacks do not spend AP.
-<indent=5%>Until the end of the Soldier's turn, their first attack against each new enemy automatically scores a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>The Soldier immediately reloads their current weapon.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Starting from the next round and until the end of combat, the Soldier's AP are reduced by −1.</indent>

languages.text:
Солдат получает способность без затрат ОД совершать дополнительные атаки — те, что при использовании выбранного оружия в обычном случае требуют меньше всего {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g}. Количество этих атак равно {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}скорострельности{/g} оружия (минимум 2).
-<indent=5%>До конца хода солдата каждое первое его попадание в новую цель становится {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}критическим{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Солдат немедленно перезаряжает используемое оружие.</indent>
-<indent=5%>С начала следующего раунда до конца боя у солдата становится на 1 ОД меньше.</indent>
languages.original_text:
The Soldier gains the ability to make a number of extra attacks equal to their weapon's {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g} (minimum 2), using the weapon attack that normally costs the least {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. These attacks do not spend AP.
-<indent=5%>Until the end of the Soldier's turn, their first attack against each new enemy automatically scores a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>The Soldier immediately reloads their current weapon.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Starting from the next round and until the end of combat, the Soldier's AP are reduced by −1.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
Стрелок получает способность без затрат ОД совершать дополнительные атаки – те, что при использовании выбранного оружия в обычном случае требуют меньше всего ОД. Количество этих атак равно скорострельности оружия (минимум 2).
-<indent=5%>До конца хода стрелка каждое первое его попадание в новую цель становится критическим.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Стрелок немедленно перезаряжает используемое оружие.</indent>
-<indent=5%>С начала следующего раунда до конца боя у стрелка становится на 1 ОД меньше.</indent>

Стрелок получает способность без затрат ОД совершать дополнительные атаки – те, что при использовании выбранного оружия в обычном случае требуют меньше всего ОД. Количество этих атак равно скорострельности оружия (минимум 2).
-<indent=5%>До конца хода стрелка каждое первое его попадание в новую цель становится критическим.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Стрелок немедленно перезаряжает используемое оружие.</indent>
-<indent=5%>С начала следующего раунда до конца боя у стрелка становится на 1 ОД меньше.</indent>

languages.text:
士兵获得{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}，可以使用{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}消耗最低的攻击方式额外进行攻击。额外攻击次数等于武器的{g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}射速{/g}，最少2次，额外攻击不消耗行动点数。
- <indent=5%>士兵的{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束之前，每当攻击新的敌人时，首次攻击都必定造成{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击{/g}。</indent>
- <indent=5%>士兵会立刻{g|Encyclopedia:Reload}重新装填{/g}当前武器。</indent>
- <indent=5%>从下一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}开始，士兵的行动点数永久减少1点，效果持续至战斗结束。</indent>
languages.original_text:
The Soldier gains the {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} to make a number of extra attacks equal to their weapon's {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g} (minimum 2), using the weapon attack that normally costs the least {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. These attacks do not spend AP.
-<indent=5%>Until the end of the Soldier's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, their first attack against each new enemy automatically scores a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>The Soldier immediately {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}reloads{/g} their current weapon.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Starting from the next {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} and until the end of combat, the Soldier's AP are reduced by −1.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
神射手获得{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}，可以获得额外的攻击次数，使用武器{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}消耗最低的攻击方式进行攻击。额外攻击次数等同于武器的{g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}射速{/g}，最少2次。额外攻击不消耗行动点数。
- <indent=5%>神射手的{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束之前，每当攻击新的敌人时，首次攻击都必将造成{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击{/g}。</indent>
- <indent=5%>神射手会立刻{g|Encyclopedia:Reload}重新装填{/g}当前武器。</indent>
- <indent=5%>从下一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}开始，神射手的行动点数永久减少1点，效果持续至战斗结束。</indent>

languages.text:
El soldado gana la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} de efectuar tantos ataques adicionales como la {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}cadencia de disparo{/g} de su arma (mínimo 2), empleando el ataque de su arma que en circunstancias normales le costaría menos {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}. Estos ataques no gastan PA.
-<indent=5%>Hasta el final del {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del soldado, el primer ataque que efectúe contra cada nuevo enemigo inflige automáticamente un {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}impacto crítico{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>El soldado {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}recarga{/g} inmediatamente el arma que está usando.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Empezando a partir del siguiente {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g} y hasta el final del combate, los PA del soldado se reducen en −1.</indent>
languages.original_text:
The Soldier gains the {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} to make a number of extra attacks equal to their weapon's {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g} (minimum 2), using the weapon attack that normally costs the least {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. These attacks do not spend AP.
-<indent=5%>Until the end of the Soldier's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, their first attack against each new enemy automatically scores a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>The Soldier immediately {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}reloads{/g} their current weapon.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Starting from the next {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} and until the end of combat, the Soldier's AP are reduced by −1.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
El tirador de élite gana la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} de efectuar tantos ataques adicionales como la {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}cadencia de disparo{/g} de su arma (mínimo 2) empleando el ataque de su arma que en circunstancias normales le costaría menos {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}. Estos ataques no gastan PA.
-<indent=5%>Hasta el final del {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del tirador de élite, el primer ataque que efectúe contra cada nuevo enemigo consigue automáticamente un {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}impacto crítico{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>El tirador de élite {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}recarga{/g} inmediatamente el arma que está usando.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Empezando a partir del siguiente {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g} y hasta el final del combate, los PA del tirador de élite se reducen en −1.</indent>

languages.text:
Der Soldat erlangt die {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g}, entsprechend der {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}Feuergeschwindigkeit{/g} seiner Waffe zusätzliche Angriffe auszuführen (mindestens 2). Dabei wird der Angriff der Waffe eingesetzt, der normalerweise die wenigsten {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} kostet. Diese Angriffe verbrauchen keine AP.
-<indent=5%>Bis zum Ende des {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g} des Soldaten erzielt sein erster Angriff gegen jeden neuen Feind automatisch einen {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritischen Treffer{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Der Soldat {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}lädt{/g} seine aktuelle Waffe sofort nach.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Ab Beginn der nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} und bis zum Ende des Kampfes reduzieren sich die AP des Soldaten um −1.</indent>
languages.original_text:
The Soldier gains the {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} to make a number of extra attacks equal to their weapon's {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g} (minimum 2), using the weapon attack that normally costs the least {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. These attacks do not spend AP.
-<indent=5%>Until the end of the Soldier's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, their first attack against each new enemy automatically scores a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>The Soldier immediately {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}reloads{/g} their current weapon.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Starting from the next {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} and until the end of combat, the Soldier's AP are reduced by −1.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
Der Scharfschütze erlangt die {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g}, entsprechend der {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}Feuergeschwindigkeit{/g} seiner Waffe zusätzliche Angriffe auszuführen (minimal 2). Dabei wird der Angriff der Waffe eingesetzt, der die wenigsten {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} kostet. Diese Angriffe verbrauchen keine AP.
-<indent=5%>Bis zum Ende der {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Runde{/g} des Scharfschützen erzielt sein erster Angriff gegen jeden neuen Feind automatisch einen {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritischen Treffer{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Der Scharfschütze {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}lädt{/g} seine aktuelle Waffe automatisch nach.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Ab Beginn der nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} und bis zum Ende des Kampfes reduzieren sich die AP des Scharfschützen um −1.</indent>

languages.text:
Le Soldat acquiert la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} de lancer un nombre d'attaques supplémentaires égal à la {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}cadence de tir{/g} de son arme (minimum 2) en utilisant l'attaque de son arme qui coûte normalement le moins de {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}. Ces attaques ne coûtent aucun PA.
-<indent=5%>Jusqu'à la fin du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} du Soldat, la première attaque qu'il lance contre chaque nouvel ennemi se traduit automatiquement par un {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}coup critique{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Soldat {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}recharge{/g} immédiatement son arme.</indent>
-<indent=5%>À partir du {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} suivant et jusqu'à la fin du combat, une réduction de 1 s'applique aux PA du Soldat.</indent>
languages.original_text:
The Soldier gains the {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} to make a number of extra attacks equal to their weapon's {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g} (minimum 2), using the weapon attack that normally costs the least {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. These attacks do not spend AP.
-<indent=5%>Until the end of the Soldier's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, their first attack against each new enemy automatically scores a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>The Soldier immediately {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}reloads{/g} their current weapon.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Starting from the next {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} and until the end of combat, the Soldier's AP are reduced by −1.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
Le Tireur d'Élite acquiert la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} de lancer un nombre d'attaques supplémentaires égal à la {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}cadence de tir{/g} de son arme (minimum 2) en utilisant l'attaque de son arme qui coûte normalement le moins de {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}. Ces attaques ne coûtent aucun PA.
- <indent=5%>Jusqu'à la fin du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} du Tireur d'Élite, la première attaque qu'il lance contre chaque nouvel ennemi se traduit automatiquement par un {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}coup critique{/g}.</indent>
- <indent=5%>Le Tireur d'Élite {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}recharge{/g} immédiatement son arme.</indent>
- <indent=5%>À partir du {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} suivant et jusqu'à la fin du combat, une réduction de -1 s'applique aux PA du Tireur d'Élite.</indent>

languages.text:
兵士が通常時に最も{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}を消費しない武器の{g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}連射速度{/g}に等しい回数（最低2回）の追加攻撃を行う{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}を得る。これらの攻撃はAPを消費しない。
-<indent=5%>兵士の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}が終わるまで、新しい敵に対する最初の攻撃が自動的に{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}クリティカルヒット{/g}になる。</indent>
-<indent=5%>兵士が即座に現在の武器を{g|Encyclopedia:Reload}リロード{/g}する。</indent>
-<indent=5%>次の{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}から戦闘終了まで、兵士のAPが-1減少する。</indent>
languages.original_text:
The Soldier gains the {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} to make a number of extra attacks equal to their weapon's {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g} (minimum 2), using the weapon attack that normally costs the least {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. These attacks do not spend AP.
-<indent=5%>Until the end of the Soldier's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, their first attack against each new enemy automatically scores a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>The Soldier immediately {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}reloads{/g} their current weapon.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Starting from the next {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} and until the end of combat, the Soldier's AP are reduced by −1.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
マークスマンは、通常の{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}消費が最も少ない武器を用いて、その武器の{g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}連射速度{/g}に等しい回数（最低2回）の追加攻撃を行う{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}を得る。これらの攻撃はAPを消費しない。
-<indent=5%>マークスマンの{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}終了まで、新しい敵に対する初めての攻撃は自動的に{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}クリティカルヒット{/g}となる。</indent>
-<indent=5%>マークスマンは即座に現在の武器を{g|Encyclopedia:Reload}リロード{/g}する。</indent>
-<indent=5%>次の{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}開始時から戦闘終了まで、マークスマンのAPが-1減少する。</indent>
